Parameter.name: VERS_HW_TRX
Parameter.desc: Hardware version number of the device (or transceiver for a remote module)

Parameter.name: VERS_FW_TRX
Parameter.desc: Software version number run by the device (or transceiver for a remote module)

Parameter.name: DATEHOUR_LAST_UPDATE
Parameter.desc: Date/time of the last successful firmware download

Parameter.name: L6App
Parameter.desc: Version of the application layer

Parameter.name: RF_UPLINK_CHANNEL
Parameter.desc: Frequency channel to be used for all uplink message transmissions

Parameter.name: RF_DOWNLINK_CHANNEL
Parameter.desc: Frequency channel to be used for all message receptions (except firmware download)

Parameter.name: RF_UPLINK_MOD
Parameter.desc: Modulation to be used for all uplink message transmissions

Parameter.name: RF_DOWNLINK_MOD
Parameter.desc: Modulation to be used for all message receptions (except firmware download)

Parameter.name: TX_POWER
Parameter.desc: Transceiver nominal transmission power

Parameter.name: TX_DELAY_FULLPOWER
Parameter.desc: Maximum time between two COMMAND messages before the device automatically returns to maximum transmission power

Parameter.name: TX_FREQ_OFFSET
Parameter.desc: Absolute transmission correction frequency offset

Parameter.name: EXCH_RX_DELAY
Parameter.desc: Fixed wait time after transmission of a DATA message by the device and before opening the COMMAND message listening window

Parameter.name: EXCH_RX_LENGTH
Parameter.desc: Duration of the COMMAND message listening window by the device

Parameter.name: EXCH_RESPONSE_DELAY
Parameter.desc: Time between reception of a COMMAND message by the device and transmission of the corresponding RESPONSE message

Parameter.name: EXCH_RESPONSE_DELAY_MIN
Parameter.desc: Minimum value accepted for the EXCH_RESPONSE_DELAY parameter (defined by the device MANUFACTURER)

Parameter.name: L7TRANSMIT_LENGTH_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum length of application messages that can be sent by the device

Parameter.name: L7RECEIVE_LENGTH_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum length of application messages that can be received by the device

Parameter.name: CLOCK_CURRENT_EPOC
Parameter.desc: Current time of device

Parameter.name: CLOCK_OFFSET_CORRECTION
Parameter.desc: Relative correction (time delta) to be applied to the device clock once only to correct its absolute drift

Parameter.name: CLOCK_DRIFT_CORRECTION
Parameter.desc: Correction of device clock frequency

Parameter.name: CIPH_CURRENT_KEY
Parameter.desc: Current key number

Parameter.name: CIPH_KEY_COUNT
Parameter.desc: Number of encryption keys available in the device

Parameter.name: L6NetwIdSelect
Parameter.desc: Kmac key index

Parameter.name: PING_RX_DELAY
Parameter.desc: Fixed waiting time after transmission of an INSTPING message by the device and before opening the INSTPONG message listening window

Parameter.name: PING_RX_LENGTH
Parameter.desc: Duration of the INSTPONG message listening window by the device

Parameter.name: PING_RX_DELAY_MIN
Parameter.desc: Minimum value of the PING_RX_DELAY parameter

Parameter.name: PING_RX_LENGTH_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum value of the PING_RX_LENGTH parameter

Parameter.name: PING_LAST_EPOCH
Parameter.desc: Execution time of the last connectivity test (INSTPING/INSTPONG)

Parameter.name: PING_NBFOUND
Parameter.desc: Number of different INSTPONG messages received in response to the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY1
Parameter.desc: Response 1 received for the last connectivity test (Bigest L7RssiDown)

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY2
Parameter.desc: Response 2 received for the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY3
Parameter.desc: Response 3 received for the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY4
Parameter.desc: Response 4 received for the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY5
Parameter.desc: Response 5 received for the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY6
Parameter.desc: Response 6 received for the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY7
Parameter.desc: Response 7 received for the last connectivity test

Parameter.name: PING_REPLY8
Parameter.desc: Response 8 received for the last connectivity test (Lowest L7RssiDown)

Parameter.name: EXECPING_PERIODE
Parameter.desc: Periodic time of execping sending by the device, in months
